name: Heavy Traffic Racer
description:
another cool chasing game is awaiting to be in your hands so fasten your belts to chase the thief who is literally escaping after a theft.Heavy traffic racer is a new android game of 2017 basically a police chasing game in the chunky traffic which is filled with huge trucks and busses and along with small cars all these vehicles will obstruct from you in catching the thief the main mission in this traffic police chase game is the player need to steer the police cop car just behind the thief who is escaping on a bike but all this action is constrained to the fuel of the police car so you need to take in consideration of the police car fuel and play smart to win in this heavy traffic racer police chase game.

Get the Game of Heavy Traffic Racer Police Chase for free here
